original_text: And he went up thence to Penuel, and spake unto them likewise: and the men of Penuel answered him as the men of Succoth had answered him.
korean_text: 거기서 브누엘로 올라가서 그들에게도 그같이 구한즉 브누엘 사람들의 대답도 숙곳 사람들의 대답과 같은지라

sentences.original_text: And he went up thence to Penuel
and the men of Penuel answered him
as the men of Succoth had answered him
